text: Is there a way were we can use this loading="lazy " in the image module of HubSpot
Anyone know if there is a way to copy forms from one portal to another to save having to recreate them?
Not possbile... something is cooking in beta though
We are working on support for native lazy loading. Right now you need to do it inside of custom modules. I don’t have an ETA to announce at this time.

Is it possible to include a .srt file or captions with a HubSpot Video?  I'm working on putting together a video library as part of our support on our website and I'm deciding between using HubSpot videos (for reporting capability) or simply embedding our YouTube videos. If captions aren't supported by HubSpot, I'm going with YouTube.  TIA!

To whom it may concern <@U7SL518D6>? The HubSpot Extension for VS Code is a huge help. But I notice there is an error in the field.group snippet. There needs to be a comma after “help_text”.

Always comes through without one.

Hey thanks for reporting! I’ve  filed it here <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-cms-tools/issues/368>

If you ever find any issues or would like a feature I suggest adding an issue to the GitHub.

You’re also welcome to submit a PR if you feel like getting involved :slightly_smiling_face:
